mapper.select: select rep_id, rep_content, rep_like_num, rep_dislike_num, rep_create_time, rep_r_id, rep_u_id, U_id r_u_id, U_avater r_u_avater, U_username r_u_username from reply,user where U_id=rep_u_id and rep_com_id = #{comId} and rep_state = 1 order by rep_create_time
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET rep_like_num=rep_like_num+1 where rep_id=#{repId}
UPDATE reply SET rep_dislike_num=rep_dislike_num+1 where rep_id=#{repId}

choose.when: insert into reply (rep_com_id, rep_r_id, rep_u_id, rep_type, rep_content) VALUES(#{repComId}, #{repRId}, #{repUId}, #{repType}, #{repContent})
choose.otherwise: insert into reply (rep_com_id, rep_u_id, rep_type, rep_content) VALUES(#{repComId}, #{repUId}, #{repType}, #{repContent})
